website_summaries.verdict: Powder foundation provides great coverage at a fraction of the cost of other premium options.
pros: Won Allure Magazine's reader's choice award for best foundation
30 distinct colors to help you find your perfect match
Good for sheer to full coverage
cons: The powder to cream formula can be a bit difficult to perfect in the beginning

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal...
customer_reviews.text: Silly silly me for not reading the reviews first... The first clue was that the lid said “ORICINAL” rather than original. The coverage was terrible and my skin broke out the first time I used it. Gave it another try and back to Amazon I went for a return label. Will be buying directly from the Bare Minerals store this weekend to assure I get a genuine product. Very disappointing to see people being fooled. As I frequently read, only giving one star because 0 isn’t an option.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: So nice to be reunited
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while but I found it and I'm back. This product virtually changed my skin forever. It helped heal and nurture my face. O love that it's not liquid and slimey on my face. It doesnt cake and it is easy to refresh of needed. It is so nice to just apply and look 100 times better even before the rest of my makeup is on.
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit??
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with this product. I think that this is not what it was supposed to be and is in fact counterfeit. The coverage is nonexistent and the color despite being "light" is almost orange on my face and is noticeably dark which is weird because a friend gave me a medium beige to try and the color was much lighter on my face although it is further down the line on the bare escentuals color scale and the coverage was much better. This is not the experience I am accustomed to with bare escentuals.
customer_reviews.author: LRY

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, this cost $10 more in the stores and I got it in 2 days. It was exactly what I expected and good value! It works excellent you can get full coverage or light depending how much you use. It doesn’t clog your pores and feels good!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I used to love bare minerals but not this one. While it is labeled light, it is a yellow/orange unnatural color and the consistency seemed to off. Never had this problem before, don't know if I got a bad batch but this was unusable and I moved on to another brand
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Love this powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this light power, hate wearing liquid foundation! This makes me look natural. Love this powder. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: This is a FAKE! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a fake. It ought to be illegal to sell a completely fraudulent product. It made me break out and caused severe dermatitis. I should’ve trusted the reviews instead of the price! You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hart

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: Covers perfectly yet light weight. Make sure to match your color for a no make up look. Better than liquid foundations that adhere to aged skin.
customer_reviews.author: friend

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to the right color. I purchased “light” and it turned my face orange. Does not blend. Waste of money. Probably fake. Missed the reviews. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Savka

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure it was fake...I actually had to go back to Ulta to buy more. Stopped wearing bare minerals altogether as a matter of fact.
customer_reviews.author: Sara wall

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Feels good on the skin. light weight. my skin can breathe. it doesn’t make my skin dry. Still figuring it out. happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Great powder
customer_reviews.text: The power goes on lights in evenly. Prefer the powder to the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not care for this!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think it’s the real deal?!?! Never used bare minerals before so not real sure how it’s supposed to even be but I do know it made my wrinkles stand out big time. Wasn’t happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly question whether this product is truly  made by Bare Minerals
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the others reviews before buying. This in no way resembles the Bare Minerals product I have bought for years from another store. The color is wrong, the texture is different and above all, it has an awful smell!. Bare Minerals foundation has no smell, This stuff actually makes me sick from the smell and looks terrible on. This company is giving Amazon and Bare Minerals a bad name! I thought the manufacturer had changed the formula so I bought the same one at a store in town. No comparison, this one is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Organic Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal!!
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve listened to the other reviews! This stuff is not the real deal, and when applied it has this bizarre shiny look to it. Returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Better for skin
customer_reviews.text: Major skin improvement since I started using it as far as dryness and break outs. Great coverage. I always wanted to try this and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tranter

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful produt which my wife loves
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful produt which my wife loves! But I find it most useful when the package is full upon purchase. When you purchase it and the container arrives empty, it is hard to enjoy this product. So I am giving it a poor rating because I can't do anything with a empty container.
customer_reviews.author: LI Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this foundation for years. It Is very light and provides a very natural look. My skin is very sensitive and prone to breakouts, but I have never had an issue with this product. Would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: lisad71

customer_reviews.title: Naturally pretty
customer_reviews.text: This powder covers beautifully and imparts a very natural appearance. It is long wearing and does not clog or irritate my skin; this is the best foundation I've ever used and hands down my favorite of all brands.
customer_reviews.author: SJ from PA

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise works great!
customer_reviews.text: This light color is almost to orange for my skin. Otherwise works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit product
customer_reviews.text: Counterfeit. Low quality insert, totally different label on top (left in Pic is authentic).
customer_reviews.author: Emmina

customer_reviews.title: I especially love the way the make up photographs
customer_reviews.text: I have used Bare Minerals for years. I especially love the way the make up photographs. I do find that you must be sure to exfoliate and moisturize regularly when using this product daily, otherwise it tends to highlight your dry patches.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Hawkins Coupel

customer_reviews.title: That's about $8 wasted. Not packaged well
customer_reviews.text: Product came in the expected amount of time, but the lid was so sealed shut I had to use my took box. When the lid finally became loose, I found that the plastic seal was already broken, and I lost about 1/3 of the product on the floor. That's about $8 wasted. Not packaged well, incredibly disappointed. Won't purchase again, not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Bare Minerals Original foundation for years as it's the only foundation that doesn't clog my pores or cause me to break out. I am very fair with blonde hair so Light (W15) works perfectly on my skin. I don't bother with any other foundations anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Highlandsparrow

customer_reviews.title: Was sent with no cap
customer_reviews.text: The product was the same as I purchase from big retailers, but it came with no cap. Thankfully I was able to use the cap from my empty container, but bizarre that it didn't come with one.
customer_reviews.author: Number1Mamasita

customer_reviews.title: bare minerals - light
customer_reviews.text: I have been using bare minerals for years. I've used other less expensive products and am never as satisfied with them. I received this item faster than the expected delivery date in sealed packaging, and it appears to be the real product. I have no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: raven

customer_reviews.title: BareMinerals
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years, tried other foundations but always come back to BareMinerals. Goes on even and stays put. Covers as well as a liquid and feels much better on my face. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for years
customer_reviews.text: This is the kind of makeup that makes you look better naturally, but is good to your skin as well. You can sleep in it. I have not had any trouble with it and I have used it for four years.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Bienvenu

customer_reviews.title: The prod said the right # for color, but was NOT the right shade. much darker, so def NOT satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Not correct Color shade. The number on product is correct, but shade is darker. Not satisfied
customer_reviews.author: PIZZABOY

customer_reviews.title: I discovered this product several years ago and have found ...
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this product several years ago and have found that it really covers the blemishes and looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Mom

customer_reviews.title: Bare Minerals
customer_reviews.text: Could not use it. Even the lightest shade was too "yellow" for me. I don't know what else to say about it. Sometimes it does not pay to listed to the adds.
customer_reviews.author: Balticlady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best make up, light and covers well, doesn't break you out and lasts all day
customer_reviews.author: KathyL

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Make-up
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily. I like it because it is light and I cannot feel it on my face. It smooths and covers minor flaws which is all I need. I have ordered this many times.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: i ordered the light but this seems a little dark ...
customer_reviews.text: i ordered the light but this seems a little dark. thought it was just me but asked a few friends and family and they said the samething. it was darker than it should have been.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this light formula that lasts all day. Helps even out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ann P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite "staple"! Thanks, Bare Essentials for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Not the right color. Knock off! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for years
customer_reviews.text: This is the best make up I have ever found. I like the more natural look, and this covers without being TOO "covery"
customer_reviews.author: LynneCreek

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love bare minerals. This is well worth the price! Honestly, it makes redness disappear after long term use. I tell everyone
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I wanted- full size original foundation- Bare Minerals! the best! absolutely love the price! will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: bareminerals face powder
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, quick and gives my face a very natural appearance. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and covers pretty naturally if you use enough. I use concealer first and then cover with bare minerals.
customer_reviews.author: Veronique LeSeur

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the product before. For years now. This is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: LOVEEEEE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have used bare minerals for years and i LOVEEEEEEEE it! works great and you can adjust how little/much you want to wear! received it super fast and no problems! will definitely order again when im running low! great price--a lot less than sephora :)
customer_reviews.author: M. JENKINS

customer_reviews.title: best makeup
customer_reviews.text: i have been using bareminerals for a couple of years now and am hooked. this is the only product i've found that doesn't clog my pores or break my face out. this stuff is AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dani b

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying BareMinerals for 4 years now and I got excited that this product was at a discounted price. I don't know if the makeup was old or something, but it did not provide the coverage that I usually get from BareMinerals. I don't understand why the consistency was so different but I am disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive, acne prone skin. This is the first foundation that I've ever used that does not exacerbate the condition. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color was not the same as the ones I purchased from Bare Minerals
customer_reviews.author: BadAzz

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using bare minerals foundation for a while and I was excited when I found it for cheaper online. However, after using this foundation the first time, I realized it isn't the real bare minerals. It is in the same container and looks completely legitimate but the coverage is awful and the powder even looks different.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hochstetler

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love Bare Minerals!
customer_reviews.text: Since discovering the world of Bare Minerals years ago, I would never go back to liquid makeup. All the fashion magazines say ladies over a certain age shouldn't use powdered makeup (highlights the wrinkles apparently!) but I have never had a problem. This makeup is light, non greasy and can be touched up at the end of the day if I am going out and want a little more coverage. This is definitely going to be a part of my beauty protocol forever.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, let me in the face all very beautiful and velvety, lasts me all day, I really fell in love and I will continue buying
customer_reviews.author: johanna sancho

customer_reviews.title: Color is labeled incorrect
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the same product and the color is incorrect. It's a shade lighter then it's labeled. I will go back to buying it at Ulta or the Bare Minerals website.
customer_reviews.author: Angel N.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great item - great price!
customer_reviews.text: I've recently switched to Bare Minerals, and I will never go back. I LOVE IT! It DOES take some getting used to, especially if you have never used loose powder before (which I hadn't). But once you get the hang of it, you will love how fast you can apply it and how great your skin looks (and more importantly, feels) when you are wearing it. AND...buy it from Amazon to get a much better deal! I paid about $10 less for it through here than I would have at the store.
customer_reviews.author: kbz2

customer_reviews.title: More than expected.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package and saw the larger size, I was surprised. The price was better than through Bare Minerals and it was delivered so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tafetta

customer_reviews.title: I've never been able to wear base before and now I can!
customer_reviews.text: Base always showed my dry skin and it looked horrible. This base is flawless. I can't believe it took me 30 years to find it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynleah Smart

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little darker than expected.. will try a shade lighter next time.
customer_reviews.author: Rk

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same as you would buying from the store, maybe it was expired but had to toss it. Buy it from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chan

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using bare minerals for 5 years now and absolutely love it. I have oily/acne prone skin so this is the best product for me. I don't feel "cakey" with this foundation on, and it offers good coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: It's fake don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: this bare mineral light foundation is fake. it's like a sand. Don't but waste your money by buying this from this seller. I really disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mani k

customer_reviews.title: Would buy from different seller
customer_reviews.text: The locking lid which keeps the extra makeup from coming out when not in use doesnt work very well. There is always makeup in there when I open it.
customer_reviews.author: Nailgal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This makeup was exactly what I needed! Great price too! More affordable than buying in expensive department stores! Can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: I love Bare Minerals because it covers well and feels like I'm not wearing makeup at all, I like the clean feel.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlene Perryman

customer_reviews.title: It is great!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what i wanted for a way cheaper price than in stores! I would defiantly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Daine89

customer_reviews.title: Love them for the price !
customer_reviews.text: I love Bare minerals its basically the best foundation/veil out there however I hate the price ! Amazon and Ebay help alot with it I normally find it for about 10 off and I love it ! I will continue to purchase from here. As far as shipping goes I got it in 3 days before my estimated shipping time :) .... Always a plus ! Thanks !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonesy

customer_reviews.title: Not The Real Thing
customer_reviews.text: I did not read the reviews until after the item had shipped. BIG mistake! I agree that this is not actually Bare Minerals. I had some of my Bare Minerals foundation left over and figured I would test it against this product. This pales in comparison to the real thing. It offers little to any coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mabry

customer_reviews.title: Made my acne MORE noticable
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to start using this base on all the good things I have heard about it. Unfortuantely I didn't work that great for me. I have cystic acne arounf my jaw line and dark scars from it. This foundation did nothing to conceal my acne, in fact it made themlike a purpleish color which to me made them more noticable. I even tried using this with my regular concealor and a bareminerals concealor and again they were still purple. It was nice on my cheeks where I didn't have acne. I think your skin needs to be moderately blemish and inperfection free for this to work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Not really Bare Minerals, beware this is a knock off,
customer_reviews.text: Color and texture made it obvious this is not a real Bare Minerals product. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice coverage..
customer_reviews.text: Light and covers great. A little pricey for dust though... lol
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Reviews were wrong...this is  the real thing...and a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup..... This is the real thing. I was just at a "mall store", and they priced the same thing $11.00 higher. So even with a minor shipping charge I saved money. If you know how to use this, know the color you need, and love Bare Minerals, you will have no problems and this is the place to get it! I am very pleased with my purchase. Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product from this company. It is a fake! It doesn’t glide on like the real product and it looks cakey. If I wanted to look I am in junior high and just started applying makeup, I’d go back to that time in my life. Don’t be fooled
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Truly Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Bare Minerals Original Foundation for many years. It makes my skin tone look even and flawless. A little of this product goes a long way and you must be careful to not over powder your face. I like that it doesn't feel heavy on my skin, the way liquid foundation does, and it doesn't make me break out. I will be using this product for as long as they make it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Farfsing

customer_reviews.title: World's Best Concealer
customer_reviews.text: The VERY BEST affordable concealer in the world. It costs more, at time of purchase, but it lasts for months. It conceals all day, so in the end, it costs less than drug store concealers that have to be constantly reapplied and don't blend as well, OR conceal blemishes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This makes my skin so oily after i use it, its nasty. I thought maybe i was doing something wrong, but i tried it again a few times and same thing happened. Never again will i purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: EOL

customer_reviews.title: BareMinerals Orginal SPF 15 Foundation# light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this powder for myself but the color was not right. I used the fair light. some one told me that SPF has an date that they are not good she work at a store then some one else said they are still good. This was my own personal chose to use the BareMinerals and I like then
customer_reviews.author: Righty 13

customer_reviews.title: I love Bare Minerals
customer_reviews.text: I love Bare Minerals. You don't even feel like you're wearing make up. If I've had a long day and don't wash my face before bed, I don't have to worry about a breakout. This is a great product that I've used for years!
customer_reviews.author: Britt A.

customer_reviews.title: Love Bare Minerals
customer_reviews.text: Love this foundation. Goes on beautifully. Looks and feels great. Lasts forever; about 9 months, making it a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: best make up ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this makeup for years.....since it first came out. I've tried other brands and they are not the same. it's worth the money to buy this product. good coverage. does not block pores or create pimples. great colors. best makeup i ever bought and will never use anything else. and i will recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: B. MARTIN-MILLS

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not enough
customer_reviews.text: It's never easy finding make-up that covers/matches your skin tone on-line, but the reviews were positive on this, so I gave it a try. It is just ok. Covers well enough, but doesn't look 'polished'. Don't get me wrong, I wear it, just not crazy about it.
customer_reviews.author: the momma

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: I used this product because my skin would breakout with anything else. Apparently, I am gluten inotlerant and allergic to corn. This product is great for those who are gluten intolerant, but not for those allergic to corn. It made me breakout (not as much as other makeup).
customer_reviews.author: Nikicks

customer_reviews.title: I love this foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product about two years ago. One day, shortly thereafter, a friend of mine told me my complexion looked beautiful and asked me what I was doing to get such a glow. Guess what??? It was this foundation that made the difference.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent makeup
customer_reviews.text: Wear this everyday. My dermatologist actually told me to wear BareMinerals and I must say it's clean, feels nice on the face. Not a heavy makeup. I do use Lauren Hutton spot concealer but use mostly all BareMineral products.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Best Foundation !
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation . It gives me great coverage without feeling like I am wearing anything on my face. I get lots of compliments that my complexion is so young looking. You can go swimming and perspire and it doesn't sweat off, it still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Rondy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I love being able to order my Bare Minerals from Amazon. So fast delivery and perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years and absolutely LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Teek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love bare minerals, have been a user for years with no plans to change.
customer_reviews.author: JavaGrammyRN

customer_reviews.title: Tried the rest - try the best
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend as a gift and in her own words she described it as , "freakin awesome!" - Enough Said!
customer_reviews.author: CheekyBugga805

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This product will complete your foundation collection of Bare Minerals. I love it. All you need is to choose the right color for you. I wear this one in the fall and winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Sassie

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: There is no makeup like baare minerals. Nothing looks more natural and nothing beats it for wearabilty. It feels and looks like just healthy skin and so very natural. It is great to know that it is also good for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Massage Therapist

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I've been using it for years. It evens out my skin tone and is easy to apply. Also, it doesn't clog pores. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Coleman Bevans Landis

customer_reviews.title: great purchase for my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, who is 24 and lives out of the states. She requested it and the price was cheaper here.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect foundation powder!
customer_reviews.text: I have used bare minerals for several years now. It never disappoints! Very light with fantastic coverage. I have combination skin and this helps even it out.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen E. Guseman

customer_reviews.title: always great products. Returning buyer
customer_reviews.text: Bare Minerals fan for years, always great products. Returning buyer. Highly recommend, don't forget your prime time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ward

customer_reviews.title: My favorite foundation
customer_reviews.text: I've used Bare Minerals for about 6 years and I absolutely love it! Sometimes I combine it with a lighter tone MAC foundation, and add this one on top of it. Bare Minerals has changed my life! It feels so light, so fresh, so natural! I will definitely buy it from Amazon again! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SparkleBeauty

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: At 50, my face is still very oily. I have tried just about everything and my face always end up being shiny after a few hours. This is the only product I have found that keeps my face from becoming an oil slick.
customer_reviews.author: nan lee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I really like BareMineral's products. They are high quality (and with the price too match! Egads!) and really look natural.
customer_reviews.author: kaitb1103

customer_reviews.title: good product at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: Per my Wife, She says this a good product and has used this brand for a long time, ( She orders this stuff on my account ), i know she likes this brand because she orders it for herself and our three Duaghters, shipping was on time and arrived as described.
customer_reviews.author: ScottS

customer_reviews.title: bunk
customer_reviews.text: I beat my old lady for buying this crap.Then had her commited.
customer_reviews.author: Birdman

product_meta.title: Bareminerals Original SPF 15 Foundation, Light, 0.28 Ounce
product_meta.description: Bareminerals Original SPF 15 Foundation, Light, 0.28 Ounce
feature_bullets: Provides sheer coverage that blends perfectly with skin
Leaves a flawless complexion with a natural glow
